p: RCM and GCM simulations were exploited in order to project HW metrics in SA according to the representative concentration pathway RCP4.5. Figure 3 shows the MMM of HW metrics computed from RCM simulations over the base period 1961–1990 (1 st row), as well as the MMM of HW metrics and TX95 estimates from RCM simulations over the period 2046–2055 under the RCP4.5 scenario (2 nd row). Figure 3 also shows the change, 1961–1990 to 2046–2055 (RCP4.5), in TX95 estimates and in HW metrics (3 rd row).
